metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13347 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
mpatch.c in Mercurial before 4.6.1 mishandles integer addition and subtraction, aka OVE-20180430-0002. It wa discovered that Mercurial incorrectly handled integer addition and subtraction. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 2.8.2-1ubuntu1.4
mercurial-common - 2.8.2-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1ubuntu1.4').
